translation.en: I hereby call this Thompson family meeting to order.
translation.zh: 我宣布这次汤普森家庭会议开始

translation.en: Now, if you all please turn to slide one,
translation.zh: 好了 请大家看幻灯片第一页

translation.en: you'll see that a third car can actually save the family money over the long run.
translation.zh: 可以看到第三辆车长久来看 会帮家庭省钱的

translation.en: Mine's just GIFs of baby porcupines eating corn on the cob.
translation.zh: 我的上面只有小豪猪吃玉米棒的动图

translation.en: Because I already know your views on increasing our carbon footprint,
translation.zh: 因为我已经知道你对于 增加我们碳足迹的想法

translation.en: so your presentation is just Best of Baby Animals.
translation.zh: 所以你的幻灯片全是 小动物动图精选

translation.en: Oh. Good thinking.
translation.zh: 哦 想法不错

translation.en: So, Mom, Dad, if you'll please turn to slide two,
translation.zh: 所以 爸爸妈妈 请翻到第二页

translation.en: you'll see that my learner's permit driving record is blemish-free.
translation.zh: 可以看到我持学习驾照的驾驶记录 完美无瑕

translation.en: Did you hire character witnesses again?
translation.zh: 你是不是又雇了品德信誉见证人？

translation.en: If that's your driver's ed teacher, he's not staying for dinner.
translation.zh: 如果是你的驾校老师 我不会允许他留下来吃晚饭的

translation.en: Where were you?
translation.zh: 你去哪儿了？

translation.en: I've been waiting at the train station all day.
translation.zh: 我在火车站等了一整天

translation.en: Who are you?
translation.zh: 你是谁？

translation.en: I'm Nick. Nicole?
translation.zh: 我是妮可

translation.en: Nicole Patterson?
translation.zh: 妮可·帕特森

translation.en: I'm here to live with you.
translation.zh: 我是来和你们同住的

translation.en: Okay, what?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: You didn't get the memo?
translation.zh: 你没收到备忘录吗？

translation.en: Was this an actual or metaphorical memo?
translation.zh: 是真的有备忘录？还是比喻性的？

translation.en: They said they called and emailed.
translation.zh: 他们说他们打了电话又发了邮件

translation.en: -[Nick sobs] -Okay, sweetie. Just tell us what happened.
translation.zh: 好了 宝贝 告诉我们发生了什么

translation.en: What happened is...
translation.zh: 发生的情况是…

translation.en: my parents...
translation.zh: 我的父母…

translation.en: died in a car accident six months ago,
translation.zh: 六个月前死于车祸

translation.en: and I've been in foster care until they could find some relatives,
translation.zh: 我一直在寄养家庭 直到他们能找到我的亲戚

translation.en: and then they said they found my dad's second cousin twice removed,
translation.zh: 然后他们说找到了我爸爸的 隔两代的堂哥

translation.en: or something, and you were supposed to pick me up at the train station.
translation.zh: 还是什么的 然后你们会去火车站接我

translation.en: You don't know what I'm talking about. Now I'll have to go back to foster care!
translation.zh: 你们不知道我在说什么 现在我只能回寄养家庭了

translation.en: Hang on a second. Nobody's making you go anywhere.
translation.zh: 慢着 没人逼你去任何地方

translation.en: We'll get to the bottom of this. You just never clarified if the memo was real.
translation.zh: 我们会一探究竟的 你只是没说清 备忘录到底是不是真的

translation.en: Here's the letter from the state.
translation.zh: 这是州政府的信

translation.en: Here's a picture of my great-grandma with, I guess, your grandma, or something.
translation.zh: 这是我曾祖母和你的… 我猜是祖母之类的合影

translation.en: Oh, Grandma Liza!
translation.zh: 哦 丽萨奶奶

translation.en: And they gave me this family tree. Oh God, this is a total nightmare!
translation.zh: 他们还给了我这个家谱图 老天 简直是噩梦！

translation.en: Okay, let's take a deep breath.
translation.zh: 好了 深呼吸

translation.en: Molly, why don't you take...
translation.zh: 茉莉 不如你带…

translation.en: -Nick! -Nick...
translation.zh: -妮可！ -妮可！

translation.en: to get something to eat while we sort this out.
translation.zh: 去吃点东西 我们研究一下情况

translation.en: Hi, I'm Molly. Do you like quinoa?
translation.zh: 嗨 我是茉莉 你喜欢藜麦吗？

translation.en: Or is this more of an ice cream situation?
translation.zh: 还是说现在这状况更适合吃冰淇淋？

translation.en: Again, I'm so, so sorry about the mix-up, folks.
translation.zh: 我再次抱歉我搞混了 各位

translation.en: I have got egg on my face.
translation.zh: 我出糗了 感觉脸上被砸了鸡蛋

translation.en: Oh, this is more than egg. This is a quiche.
translation.zh: 不 不止是鸡蛋 是蛋饼

translation.en: You quiched us.
translation.zh: 你把我们害惨了

translation.en: Mistakes happen. Don't beat yourself up about it.
translation.zh: 错误不可避免 不要太往心里去了

translation.en: Bye-bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: Can you believe that this social services coordinator
translation.zh: 你能相信吗？这个社会服务协调员

translation.en: was coordinating with another Ed Thompson?
translation.zh: 和另一个叫艾德·汤普森的人协调了

translation.en: I feel so generic!
translation.zh: 我感觉自己好普罗大众

translation.en: -I wish I had a cool nickname. -Ooh, how about Laser?
translation.zh: -我真希望我有个酷酷的昵称 -激光怎么样？

translation.en: -No. -Yes.
translation.zh: -不 -好

translation.en: [sighs] All right, well...
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: this is, uh, quite a shock.
translation.zh: 这挺令人震惊的

translation.en: We were literally caught with our pants down.
translation.zh: 我们在字面意义上被扒了裤子

translation.en: That's literally not what literally means.
translation.zh: 这个词在字面意义上就不是这个意思

translation.en: Irregardless...
translation.zh: 不论如何

translation.en: we are problem solvers.
translation.zh: 我们是解决问题的人

translation.en: We'll make this work.
translation.zh: 我们会搞定的

translation.en: So where's my room?
translation.zh: 我的房间呢？

translation.en: Well, that's a problem. I have no idea.
translation.zh: 这是个问题 我不知道

translation.en: Nick can stay with me in my room.
translation.zh: 妮可可以和我一起睡我的房间

translation.en: Seriously? I'm not even allowed in your room.
translation.zh: 真的吗？你都不允许我进你房间

translation.en: Come on, I'll show you where you can put your stuff
translation.zh: 来吧 我告诉你把东西放在哪里

translation.en: and how to follow me on Snap and Insta. Not Facebook.
translation.zh: 如何在Snapchat和Instagram上 关注我 脸书就算了

translation.en: Mom joined.
translation.zh: 妈妈加入了

translation.en: So this is going to be our room. That sofa pulls out into a bed.
translation.zh: 如果我们要住在这个房间里 那个沙发可以变成床

translation.en: But don't worry, it's more comfortable than it looks.
translation.zh: 别担心 比它看起来要舒服得多

translation.en: You're being so nice to me.
translation.zh: 你对我真好

translation.en: I really appreciate this.
translation.zh: 我非常感谢

translation.en: Hey, I care about helping people.
translation.zh: 嘿 我喜欢帮助人

translation.en: It's kind of my thing.
translation.zh: 这算是我的专长

translation.en: My thing is watching old Rocky and Bullwinkle cartoons,
translation.zh: 我的专长是看《飞鼠洛基冒险记》

translation.en: but I like your thing, too.
translation.zh: 但我也喜欢你的专长

translation.en: You can put your stuff here, and the Wi-Fi is "ThompsonsRule!"
translation.zh: 你可以把东西放在这里 WiFi密码是汤普森万岁！

translation.en: All one word, cap T, cap R, exclam.
translation.zh: 都是一个词 注意大小写 加感叹号

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我懂

translation.en: Hey, can I take a shower or something?
translation.zh: 嘿 我能洗个澡什么的吗？

translation.en: I haven't changed my clothes in, like, two days.
translation.zh: 我有两天没换衣服了

translation.en: Wow, that's super real.
translation.zh: 哇 这好真实

translation.en: The bathroom's in through there.
translation.zh: 浴室就在里面

translation.en: Thanks...
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: for everything.
translation.zh: 你做的一切

translation.en: I'm in.
translation.zh: 我打入了

translation.en: I really like her.
translation.zh: 我真的很喜欢她

translation.en: Of course you like her. She's an orphan.
translation.zh: 你当然喜欢她了 她是个孤儿

translation.en: Your friend Becky is going to be so jealous.
translation.zh: 你的朋友贝基要嫉妒死了

translation.en: You must be tired of her hogging all the attention with her brother's tumor.
translation.zh: 你恨死她了吧？用她哥哥的肿瘤 吸引了所有人注意

translation.en: -I don't care what Becky thinks. -Hey.
translation.zh: 我才不管贝基怎么想

translation.en: Maybe you can dress Nick up like a hobo and take selfies down at the dump.
translation.zh: 也许你可以把妮可扮成流浪汉 和她一起去垃圾站自拍

translation.en: So, she's staying?
translation.zh: 所以她要住下了吗？

translation.en: I'm just gonna say what your father and I are both thinking.
translation.zh: 我就直接说出你爸爸和我的想法吧

translation.en: Nick can't stay here.
translation.zh: 妮可不能住在这里

translation.en: Wait, what?
translation.zh: 慢着 什么？

translation.en: That's not what I was thinking. I was thinking the exact opposite.
translation.zh: 这不是我的想法 我的想法完全相反

translation.en: Are you serious?
translation.zh: 认真的吗？

translation.en: Because you're talking about raising another child, like, forever.
translation.zh: 因为你说的可是再养一个孩子 养她一辈子

translation.en: Not forever. Just 'til she's been with us long enough to need therapy.
translation.zh: 不用一辈子 只要养到她 和我们待到需要看心理医生

translation.en: That sounds like a worthy goal, but I'm busy right now,
translation.zh: 听起来是个挺值当的目标 但我现在有点忙

translation.en: with the cookbook and restaurant.
translation.zh: 写食谱书 还有餐厅

translation.en: And the auditions for Top Chef coming up.
translation.zh: 别忘了我还要试镜《顶级大厨》

translation.en: Believe me, no one can forget because you talk about it all the time.
translation.zh: 相信我 没人会忘记的 因为你一直在说这件事

translation.en: Guys.
translation.zh: 各位

translation.en: Mom's got a point. I mean, she's just being realistic here.
translation.zh: 妈妈说得有道理 她只是考虑现实

translation.en: Exactly.
translation.zh: 没错

translation.en: Look, I get that Nick's situation is sad.
translation.zh: 看 我知道妮可的处境挺悲伤的

translation.en: Super sad.
translation.zh: 非常悲伤

translation.en: So sad.
translation.zh: 太悲伤了

translation.en: But why does that have to make our situation sad?
translation.zh: 但为什么要因此而让我们的情况 也变悲伤？

translation.en: Because she's family.
translation.zh: 因为她是家人

translation.en: She's such a distant relative, we could legally get married.
translation.zh: 她太远亲了 法律意义上 我们结婚都不成问题

translation.en: Um, ew.
translation.zh: 恶心

translation.en: So what, you just wanna kick her out?
translation.zh: 那怎么样？你就想把她赶走？

translation.en: No. No one's saying kick her out.
translation.zh: 不 没人说要赶她走

translation.en: I'm just saying, why does she have to stay... here?
translation.zh: 我只是说她为什么非得待在这里？

translation.en: I'll tell you why she has to stay here.
translation.zh: 我告诉你她为什么非得待在这里

translation.en: Because she's a child who needs us.
translation.zh: 因为她是个需要我们的孩子

translation.en: Do I want another kid? No, I don't even want these two.
translation.zh: 我想再要个孩子吗？不 这两个我都不想要

translation.en: Just a joke, guys.
translation.zh: 开玩笑的

translation.en: I love you so much, so much, but the point is...
translation.zh: 我非常爱你们的 但重点是

translation.en: that she's my second cousin, and she's already been removed twice.
translation.zh: 她是我的二代堂妹 而且已经被隔离了两代了

translation.en: We can't do it to her a third time.
translation.zh: 不能再隔离她一次

translation.en: Yeah, I don't think that's what that means.
translation.zh: 我觉得你理解错了隔二代的意思

translation.en: It doesn't matter. We can't kick her out on the street. That's not who we are.
translation.zh: 这不重要 我们不能赶她出去 流落街头 这不是我们的为人

translation.en: Dad's right.
translation.zh: 爸爸说得对

translation.en: We have to do the right thing here.
translation.zh: 我们必须做正确的选择

translation.en: I vote she stays.
translation.zh: 我投票支持她留下

translation.en: This isn't a reality show. You don't get to vote her on or off the island.
translation.zh: 这不是真人秀 不能投票决定 要不要赶她下岛

translation.en: Everyone's opinion matters.
translation.zh: 每个人的观点都重要

translation.en: And thank you, Jeremy. I'm glad to see you coming around on this.
translation.zh: 谢谢你杰瑞米 很高兴你想开了

translation.en: Yeah, you know, me too.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Because raising a child is expensive
translation.zh: 因为再养一个孩子很贵

translation.en: and we'll have to make sacrifices.
translation.zh: 我们都得做出牺牲

translation.en: And first to go will be that new car you wanted.
translation.zh: 第一个要牺牲的就是你想要的新车

translation.en: You know, and for the record, I was gonna say yes.
translation.zh: 而且郑重声明 我本打算赞成的

translation.en: Seriously?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: I change my vote. I change my vote.
translation.zh: 我要改投

translation.en: I vote for the car.
translation.zh: 我投我们买车

translation.en: You can't change your vote.
translation.zh: 你不能改投

translation.en: [Liz] Wait. This is a tie,
translation.zh: 慢着 票数平了

translation.en: -and the tie goes to the runner. -[Jeremy] What does that even mean?
translation.zh: -打平的时候负责人获胜 -这什么意思？

translation.en: So does she want Spanish or French?
translation.zh: 她想学法语还是西班牙语？

translation.en: You can give her Klingon for all I care. This is just temporary.
translation.zh: 学克林贡语都不要紧 我不管 这只是暂时的

translation.en: So Spanish?
translation.zh: 所以西班牙语？

translation.en: [Nick] Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: Looks like you're a big deal around here.
translation.zh: 看起来你是个大人物

translation.en: Yeah, I know.
translation.zh: 是的 我知道

translation.en: Slow your roll.
translation.zh: 冷静一点

translation.en: You're sophomore class rep, not King of the North.
translation.zh: 你只是高二班代表 又不是北方之王

translation.en: Nick, sweetie...
translation.zh: 妮可 宝贝

translation.en: I know this is a difficult situation,
translation.zh: 我知道这是个困难的情况

translation.en: and you could probably use some sort of inspirational speech right now.
translation.zh: 现在你可能很想听一些 鼓舞人心的演讲

translation.en: So...
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: hold onto your dreams and...
translation.zh: 坚持你的梦想 还有…

translation.en: reach for the stars...
translation.zh: 伸手摘星

translation.en: and seize the day.
translation.zh: 把握当下

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: Bye.
translation.zh: 再见

translation.en: So Jeremy's kind of full of himself.
translation.zh: 所以杰瑞米挺自大的

translation.en: Totally.
translation.zh: 完全是

translation.en: He even keeps a future resume on his phone
translation.zh: 他手机上上甚至存了一份未来简历

translation.en: to remind him of all the things he needs to accomplish by the time he's 35.
translation.zh: 提醒自己在35岁之前要完成的事

translation.en: Spoiler alert, he becomes president.
translation.zh: 剧透 他会成为总统

translation.en: Well, he doesn't seem to like me.
translation.zh: 他似乎不喜欢我

translation.en: I guess he just doesn't want some sketchy foster kid living in his house.
translation.zh: 我猜他不想要凑数的寄养家庭孩子 和他住在一起吧

translation.en: Hey,
translation.zh: 喂

translation.en: just because you haven't been afforded the same opportunities we have,
translation.zh: 只是因为你没有获得 和我们一样的机遇

translation.en: doesn't make you sketchy.
translation.zh: 不代表你是凑数的

translation.en: Oh, my God, it means so much to hear you say that.
translation.zh: 老天 你这么说对我太重要了

translation.en: I can really tell you care.
translation.zh: 我真的能看出来你关心我

translation.en: That's my gift.
translation.zh: 这可是我的专长

translation.en: Well, I wish everyone saw it that way.
translation.zh: 我希望所有人都这么想

translation.en: Think you could talk to Jeremy for me?
translation.zh: 你能帮我劝劝杰瑞米吗？

translation.en: I totally would, honest,
translation.zh: 我非常愿意 真心的

translation.en: but Jeremy only cares about Jeremy.
translation.zh: 但杰瑞米只关心杰瑞米

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: Big news, everyone.
translation.zh: 大新闻 各位

translation.en: This is Nick.
translation.zh: 这位是妮可

translation.en: She's come to live with us because...
translation.zh: 妮可住在我们家了 因为…

translation.en: her parents died in a car crash.
translation.zh: 她父母在车祸中去世了

translation.en: So you're like...
translation.zh: 所以你是个…

translation.en: a for real orphan?
translation.zh: 真的孤儿？

translation.en: Uh... yeah, I guess so.
translation.zh: 是 我猜是的

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: -Nick'll want to join our volunteer squad. -Your what?
translation.zh: -妮可会想加入我们的志愿小队 -你的什么？

translation.en: We volunteer at soup kitchens, hospitals, old folks' homes.
translation.zh: 我们去流动厨房、医院、养老院 做志愿活动

translation.en: We're kind of Insta-famous.
translation.zh: 我们在Instagram上很火

translation.en: Wow. You guys are super woke.
translation.zh: 哇 你们超级醒目的

translation.en: Totally.
translation.zh: 绝对的

translation.en: Oh, wow, Molly. I just noticed.
translation.zh: 哇 茉莉 我刚意识到

translation.en: You're wearing a top from a major trans-national corporate retailer.
translation.zh: 你穿了一件大型跨国零售商的上衣

translation.en: I am?
translation.zh: 是吗？

translation.en: We're only shopping at Helping the Homeless Thrift Stores now.
translation.zh: 我们现在只去 帮助无家可归人士二手店购物了

translation.en: You know, #childlabor.
translation.zh: 你懂的 童工

translation.en: Actually, Helping the Homeless
translation.zh: 事实上 帮助无家可归人士二手店

translation.en: only donates nine percent of its profits to the homeless.
translation.zh: 只捐助9%的钱给无家可归人口

translation.en: Its CEO lives in Aspen.
translation.zh: 他们的CEO住在阿斯彭

translation.en: And true fact,
translation.zh: 还有一个事实

translation.en: supporting clothes manufacturers in developing nations
translation.zh: 支持发展中国家的服装制造业

translation.en: lifts millions out of poverty every year.
translation.zh: 每年能帮数百万人脱贫

translation.en: [stammers] I knew that.
translation.zh: 我知道的

translation.en: You know what? I'll talk to Jeremy and see what I can do.
translation.zh: 你知道吗？我会和杰瑞米谈谈看

translation.en: Okay, people,
translation.zh: 好了 各位同学

translation.en: let's take out your chloroform and prepare to anesthetize your frogs.
translation.zh: 拿出你们的氯仿 准备麻醉青蛙

translation.en: Stand with me to save the frogs!
translation.zh: 和我站在一起拯救青蛙！

translation.en: What do we want?
translation.zh: 我们想要什么？

translation.en: Animal rights!
translation.zh: 动物权利！

translation.en: When do we want it?
translation.zh: 什么时候想要？

translation.en: Now!
translation.zh: 现在！

translation.en: Point of order, I move we table this and send it to committee.
translation.zh: 议事程序问题 我提议延迟讨论这个 交给委员会

translation.en: You're not supposed to be in here. Student council members only.
translation.zh: 你不应该进来的 只有学生会成员可以进这里

translation.en: We're trying to pass a critical dance budget.
translation.zh: 我们在努力批准很重要的跳舞预算

translation.en: Spotify and five bucks worth of streamers...
translation.zh: 用Spotify 再买五美元的彩色纸带

translation.en: Problem solved.
translation.zh: 问题解决

translation.en: Now come talk in the hallway.
translation.zh: 来走廊上和我说话

translation.en: Don't underestimate the work we do on student council.
translation.zh: 不要低估我们学生会的工作

translation.en: It benefits the whole school.
translation.zh: 是为了全校的福祉

translation.en: Says the dictator who canceled our meals on wheels program.
translation.zh: 你个取消了上门送餐服务的独裁者 还好意思说

translation.en: Because the insurance was cost-prohibitive.
translation.zh: 因为保险成本太高昂了

translation.en: They could've all come to the ice cream social
translation.zh: 他们本可以直接参加冰淇淋社交

translation.en: if you hadn't staged a protest.
translation.zh: 但你非得搞抗议

translation.en: Because ice cream isn't fair to the lactose intolerant.
translation.zh: 因为冰淇淋对于乳糖不耐受的人 是不公平的

translation.en: And, uh, speaking of intolerant,
translation.zh: 说起不耐受问题

translation.en: why are you being such a jerk to Nick?
translation.zh: 你为什么对妮可那么混蛋？

translation.en: There's something weird about that girl.
translation.zh: 那个女孩有些不对劲

translation.en: You're just being judgmental.
translation.zh: 你只是先入为主

translation.en: Besides, Dad said everything was legit.
translation.zh: 而且爸爸都说了 一切都正常

translation.en: I'm not buying it. Girls don't just show up on your doorstep. Well, not yours.
translation.zh: -我不信 妹子不会直接出现在家门口 -肯定不会到你家门口

translation.en: Admit it,
translation.zh: 承认吧

translation.en: all you care about is getting your stupid car.
translation.zh: 你只关心你愚蠢的新车

translation.en: Which, by the way, is killing our planet, thank you very much.
translation.zh: 顺便说 车会让地球加速死亡 非常感谢

translation.en: And all you care about is your social media blowing up
translation.zh: 你只关心你的社交媒体点击量

translation.en: because your latest pet project happens to be a human.
translation.zh: 因为你最新的宠物计划的主角 是一个人

translation.en: That's offensive.
translation.zh: 这很冒犯了

translation.en: I care about making the world a better place.
translation.zh: 我关心让世界变得更好

translation.en: Becky's the one turning everything into a competition.
translation.zh: 贝基才是把一切都变成竞赛的人

translation.en: Look,
translation.zh: 瞧

translation.en: promise me you'll try and be nice to Nick.
translation.zh: 向我保证你会试着对妮可友善一点

translation.en: The only thing I can promise you
translation.zh: 我唯一可以向你保证的是

translation.en: is I'm gonna find out what's really going on with her.
translation.zh: 我会搞清楚她到底是什么情况

translation.en: Where is your new best friend, anyway?
translation.zh: 你的新的最好朋友去哪儿了？

translation.en: How did you like my performance yesterday?
translation.zh: 你喜欢我昨晚的表演吗？

translation.en: Well, to be honest, Dorothy, it was a bit sloppy.
translation.zh: 老实说 多萝西 有一点马虎了

translation.en: What if they figured out that you and Sam are my real foster parents?
translation.zh: 如果他们发现你和山姆 就是我寄养家庭父母怎么办？

translation.en: Your pictures are online in the state database.
translation.zh: 你们的照片在网上和州数据库里都有

translation.en: Well, obviously, they didn't look.
translation.zh: 很明显他们没仔细找

translation.en: But you could've at least worn a disguise.
translation.zh: 你们至少可以伪装一下

translation.en: My disguise was a pantsuit.
translation.zh: 我的伪装就是西装裤套装

translation.en: It's true. She never wears those.
translation.zh: 没错 她从来不穿西装裤套装

translation.en: Listen...
translation.zh: 听着

translation.en: How's the plan going?
translation.zh: 计划如何了？

translation.en: Good. They don't suspect anything.
translation.zh: 很好 他们毫无怀疑

translation.en: They better not, after all the money we spent on the documents.
translation.zh: 最好如此 毕竟我们在文件上 花了那么多钱

translation.en: You know how much a fake court order costs?
translation.zh: 你知道假造法庭令要花多少钱吗？

translation.en: Yeah. I can get one in an hour for 30 bucks.
translation.zh: 知道 我花30美元 一个小时之后就能拿到

translation.en: Oh.
translation.zh: 哦

translation.en: That would've saved me $500!
translation.zh: 那能节约我五百美元！

translation.en: It still seems like it's an awful lot of effort
translation.zh: 还是觉得花了好多工夫

translation.en: just to rob a random family.
translation.zh: 就为了抢劫随便找的一家人

translation.en: Really, it's too much effort
translation.zh: 真的吗？价值五万美元的抢劫

translation.en: for a $50,000 score?
translation.zh: 这么做太麻烦了？

translation.en: They have two high-end cars,
translation.zh: 他们有两辆高档汽车

translation.en: jewelry, watches, silverware.
translation.zh: 珠宝、手表、银质餐具

translation.en: And with me on the inside,
translation.zh: 我打入内部之后

translation.en: there's no messy break-in, no alarms, no surprises.
translation.zh: 不需要任何凌乱的闯入 不会触发警报 不会有意外

translation.en: Okay, so how do you plan to knock 'em out?
translation.zh: 好吧 你计划怎么把他们击昏？

translation.en: Don't worry. Leave it to me. I'll let you know when I'm ready.
translation.zh: 别担心 交给我就行 我准备好了会通知你们

translation.en: You're already ready.
translation.zh: 你已经准备好了

translation.en: In and out, easy-peasy. That's the plan.
translation.zh: 进去就出来 轻松容易 这就是计划

translation.en: I'm on the inside,
translation.zh: 我在敌方内部

translation.en: so I make the call.
translation.zh: 所以我来做决定

translation.en: And we clean them out
translation.zh: 把他们洗劫一空

translation.en: when I say so.
translation.zh: 时机由我决定

translation.en: And can I borrow 20 bucks?
translation.zh: 我能借20块钱吗？

translation.en: You would not believe what they charge for a latte at this school.
translation.zh: 你们不会相信 这学校一杯拿铁卖多少钱

translation.en: Okay, listen up, people.
translation.zh: 好了 各位听好

translation.en: We are doing the orecchiette with a pork fennel sausage.
translation.zh: 我们今晚要做茴香猪肉香肠 猫耳朵意面

translation.en: The special is a brown-sugar ricotta and egg raviolo.
translation.zh: 特色菜是红糖里卡多奶酪 和意大利蛋饺

translation.en: Okay, we open in two hours, so get busy cooking or...
translation.zh: 好了 我们两小时后营业 所以忙着做饭吧 否则就

translation.en: [all] Get busy collecting unemployment.
translation.zh: 忙着领失业救济金吧

translation.en: Nick, what are you doing here?
translation.zh: 妮可 你在这里做什么？

translation.en: Well, back at the foster home, all the kids had to pull their weight.
translation.zh: 在寄养家庭里 所有孩子都要分担工作

translation.en: So I thought I could help out. I know my way around restaurants.
translation.zh: 我想帮忙 餐厅我熟悉的

translation.en: That is so thoughtful slash depressing.
translation.zh: 这真是既体贴又令人沮丧

translation.en: But thanks, everything's under control here.
translation.zh: 不过多谢 一切都在我掌控中

translation.en: Does that look like fennel to you?
translation.zh: 这看起来像茴香吗？

translation.en: Sorry, I'm obviously too busy to babysit.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我明显太忙了没空照看你

translation.en: Is everyone here completely incompetent?
translation.zh: 这里所有人都这么不称职吗？

translation.en: Cut that.
translation.zh: 切

translation.en: Wow, that's impressive.
translation.zh: 哇 令人钦佩

translation.en: Where did you learn to do that?
translation.zh: 你在哪儿学的？

translation.en: I was a cocktail waitress in Vegas for a couple years.
translation.zh: 我在拉斯维加斯做过几年 鸡尾酒服务生

translation.en: Kidding.
translation.zh: 开玩笑的

translation.en: I told you, I have some experience in restaurants.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你 我在餐厅有些经验

translation.en: Besides, I like working.
translation.zh: 而且我喜欢工作

translation.en: It makes me feel... useful.
translation.zh: 让我觉得自己有用武之地

translation.en: Okay, I guess we could use some help around here.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们确实需要一些帮手

translation.en: But if the child labor people show up, you are 18.
translation.zh: 但如果劳工部门的人出现 你18岁了

translation.en: Oh, hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: How was your day?
translation.zh: 你今天过得怎么样？

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: I don't know, isn't that like a standard question kids ask their dad?
translation.zh: 不知道 这不是普通孩子 都会问爸爸的常规问题吗？

translation.en: Maybe in 1955, but not my kids.
translation.zh: 也许1955年会吧 我孩子可不会问

translation.en: Well, their loss.
translation.zh: 那是他们的损失

translation.en: Actually...
translation.zh: 事实上

translation.en: to tell you the truth, I did have quite a day.
translation.zh: 说实话 我今天的确发生了很多事

translation.en: You see, I'm a senior loan officer at a bank,
translation.zh: 我是一家银行的高级信贷人员

translation.en: I have to decide who to give loans to.
translation.zh: 所以我要决定给谁贷款

translation.en: That sounds really interesting.
translation.zh: 听起来真的很有趣

translation.en: It does?
translation.zh: 真的吗？

translation.en: Yeah, I mean, don't you get all sorts of fascinating people
translation.zh: 不是会经常有各种各样吸引人的客户

translation.en: coming into your bank all the time?
translation.zh: 去你的银行吗？

translation.en: Actually, yes, I do.
translation.zh: 事实上的确如此

translation.en: And they must have all kinds of stories to tell,
translation.zh: 他们肯定有各种各样的故事要说

translation.en: trying to buy a house or start a business.
translation.zh: 想买房子或做生意

translation.en: If you think about it,
translation.zh: 如果仔细考虑

translation.en: you're kind of in the dream business...
translation.zh: 你算是做梦想生意的

translation.en: making people's dreams come true.
translation.zh: 帮助别人实现梦想

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: You really get me.
translation.zh: 你真的很懂我

translation.en: It's just, my dad got a loan to start a business once.
translation.zh: 我爸爸曾经申请过贷款想做生意

translation.en: He worked hard his whole life,
translation.zh: 他一辈子辛勤工作

translation.en: and I remember when I was, I don't know, maybe just like four or five...
translation.zh: 我记得我大概四五岁的时候

translation.en: he came home one night with a big cake
translation.zh: 他有一天拿着一个大蛋糕回来

translation.en: with white frosting and these little pink flowers on top.
translation.zh: 抹了白色的糖霜 上面还有粉色的小花

translation.en: You should have seen the look in his eye.
translation.zh: 真想让你看看他当时的眼神

translation.en: I remember it like it was yesterday.
translation.zh: 我记得很清楚 就像昨天

translation.en: He was proud.
translation.zh: 他很骄傲

translation.en: And so was I.
translation.zh: 我也是

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 是的

translation.en: I have seen that look many times.
translation.zh: 我见过很多次这样的眼神

translation.en: There's one lady who wants to open a yoga studio.
translation.zh: 有位女士想开一个瑜伽馆

translation.en: -She-- -[cell phone beeps]
translation.zh: 她…

translation.en: Can you hold that thought?
translation.zh: 能不能先暂停一下

translation.en: I've gotta answer this message about my...
translation.zh: 我需要回这条信息 是关于我的…

translation.en: math homework.
translation.zh: 数学家庭作业的

translation.en: Don't worry about it.
translation.zh: 别太担心

translation.en: I'm terrible at math, and I work at a bank.
translation.zh: 我数学可差了 还能在银行工作

translation.en: That's what calculators are for.
translation.zh: 计算器就是用来做这个的

translation.en: Oh, good.
translation.zh: 很好

translation.en: You got my text.
translation.zh: 你收到我的短信了

translation.en: So, what's your real name?
translation.zh: 所以你的真名是什么？

translation.en: Nicole Patterson is my real name.
translation.zh: 妮可·帕特森就是我的真名

translation.en: Then, uh, who's Nicole Masipag?
translation.zh: 那妮可·麦西佩格是谁？

translation.en: That's also my name.
translation.zh: 那也是我的名字

translation.en: After my parents died...
translation.zh: 我父母死后

translation.en: I sometimes used my mom's last name.
translation.zh: 我有时候会用我妈妈的姓

translation.en: I don't know why.
translation.zh: 我不知道为什么

translation.en: I guess I just wanted something to remember her by.
translation.zh: 我猜我只是想有些东西可以纪念她

translation.en: What gives you the right to go through my stuff?
translation.zh: 谁给你翻查我东西的权力的？

translation.en: Well, technically, it's Molly's room,
translation.zh: 严格意义上说这是茉莉的房间

translation.en: so you have no real expectation of privacy here.
translation.zh: 所以你在这里没有对隐私的期待

translation.en: Why do you hate me so much?
translation.zh: 你为什么那么讨厌我？

translation.en: I don't hate you.
translation.zh: 我不讨厌你

translation.en: I just don't trust you.
translation.zh: 我只是不信任你

translation.en: Hey, I get it.
translation.zh: 嘿 我明白

translation.en: You're obviously super-smart,
translation.zh: 你很明显是超级聪明的

translation.en: in a serial killer kind of way.
translation.zh: 像连环杀手一样

translation.en: Uh, thanks?
translation.zh: 多谢？

translation.en: And you're a natural leader.
translation.zh: 而且你是个天生的领导者

translation.en: So you think it's your job to protect everyone.
translation.zh: 所以你觉得保护所有人是你的职责

translation.en: But you don't have to worry about me.
translation.zh: 但你不用担心我

translation.en: I'm not trying to cause a disturbance in the Force.
translation.zh: 我并不想故意扰乱原力场

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: I saw your Star Wars pajamas in the laundry.
translation.zh: 在洗衣房 看到了你的《星球大战》睡衣

translation.en: You're smooth. You're a lot smarter than you seem.
translation.zh: 你很圆滑 你比看起来聪明多了

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇

translation.en: Rude.
translation.zh: 无礼

translation.en: Look, I know this isn't just about me ruining that new car for you.
translation.zh: 听着 我知道这不只是因为 我让你的新车泡汤了

translation.en: Maybe you're just afraid of sharing everything else you do have
translation.zh: 也许你只是害怕与一个你不认识的人

translation.en: with someone you don't know.
translation.zh: 分享你拥有的其他东西

translation.en: I don't know what you're up to, but I'm gonna find out.
translation.zh: 我不知道你有什么企图 但我会研究出来的

translation.en: I'm not up to anything.
translation.zh: 我没有任何企图

translation.en: I'm just a girl who needs a family.
translation.zh: 我只是一个需要家庭的女孩

translation.en: Okay?
translation.zh: 好吗？

translation.en: Are we good?
translation.zh: 我们没问题吧？

translation.en: Oh, we're far from good... Nick.
translation.zh: 我们的问题大着呢 妮可

translation.en: Dorothy, it's me. I'm pulling the trigger.
translation.zh: 多萝西 我要发号施令了

translation.en: Tell Sam tonight's the night I knock them out.
translation.zh: 告诉山姆 我今晚就会把他们击昏

translation.en: I'll text you when they're unconscious.
translation.zh: 等他们失去意识了我会发短信

translation.en: I don't care if it's Armed Forces Week on Wheel of Fortune!
translation.zh: 我才不管是不是幸运大转盘节目的 武装部队周

translation.en: Just record it!
translation.zh: 录下来就行

translation.en: [Ed] So...
translation.zh: 所以…

translation.en: how was your day?
translation.zh: 你今天怎么样？

translation.en: What do you mean?
translation.zh: 什么意思？

translation.en: That's exactly what I said when Nick asked me. Man.
translation.zh: 妮可问我这个问题的时候 我也是这么回答的 妈呀

translation.en: Is it possible that we are so self-absorbed we don't even recognize it
translation.zh: 我们有没有可能自私到了 别人有兴趣了解我们的生活 都意识不到了？

translation.en: when someone takes an interest in our lives?
translation.zh: 别人有兴趣了解我们的生活 都意识不到了？

translation.en: Well, I'm glad you and your little ward had some time for a tête-à-tête,
translation.zh: 我很高兴你和你的小被监护人 知心交谈了起来

translation.en: but I'm trying to get dinner ready. I could use help.
translation.zh: 但我在努力做晚饭 需要一点帮助

translation.en: Yeah, Nick's got me thinking.
translation.zh: 行 妮可让我思考了起来

translation.en: I mean...
translation.zh: 我的意思是…

translation.en: sometimes I feel like we are strangers living in the same house.
translation.zh: 有时候我感觉我们是生活在 同一个屋檐下的陌生人

translation.en: I mean, shouldn't we care more about the little things?
translation.zh: 我们不应该更加关注小事情吗？

translation.en: Yeah, that sounds great, but I don't know how to make that happen.
translation.zh: 听起来很棒 但我不知道要如何做到

translation.en: Neither do I, but maybe we can figure it out.
translation.zh: 我也不知道 也许我们可以一起思考

translation.en: Remember, we're a team. You're the brain, I'm the heart.
translation.zh: 记住 我们是一个团队 你是大脑 我是心脏

translation.en: Together, we make the Thompson body run like clockwork.
translation.zh: 我们一起努力 就能让汤普森家井井有条

translation.en: Yeah, but why do I always have to be the brain?
translation.zh: 行吧 但我为什么总得做大脑？

translation.en: What's wrong with the brain? Being the brain is a compliment.
translation.zh: 做大脑怎么了？做大脑是对你的赞美

translation.en: Well, sometimes I wanna be the heart.
translation.zh: 有时候我想做心脏

translation.en: The heart is the fun job. Everyone loves the heart.
translation.zh: 心脏是有趣的职位 所有人都爱心脏

translation.en: Nobody likes the brain.
translation.zh: 没人喜欢大脑

translation.en: The brain makes you do your homework and empty the dishwasher,
translation.zh: 因为大脑逼你写作业 清空洗碗机

translation.en: while the heart gets to go out for ice cream
translation.zh: 而心脏则能出去吃冰淇淋

translation.en: and take in stray children.
translation.zh: 收留流浪儿童

translation.en: I'll get it.
translation.zh: 我去开

translation.en: It'd better not be another stray child.
translation.zh: 最好别又来一个流浪儿

translation.en: Thanks.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: What's this?
translation.zh: 这是什么？

translation.en: It's called "pizza."
translation.zh: 叫做“披萨”

translation.en: It's Italian for "food."
translation.zh: 意大利语中“食物”的意思

translation.en: I know you're used to fending for yourself, but I made dinner.
translation.zh: 我知道你习惯了照顾自己 但我做了晚饭

translation.en: What's the special occasion?
translation.zh: 今天是什么特殊场合？

translation.en: Did someone die?
translation.zh: 有人死了吗？

translation.en: No, it's Nick's first real dinner with us.
translation.zh: 不 今天是妮可第一次 正式和我们吃晚餐

translation.en: You did this all for me?
translation.zh: 这些都是为我做的吗？

translation.en: -You don't eat together every night? -[Liz] Hell no.
translation.zh: 你们不是每天晚上都一起吃？ 当然不是

translation.en: But if you wanna to eat your pizza in your room, that's fine.
translation.zh: 如果你只想去房间吃披萨也挺好

translation.en: I mean, I cooked my signature osso buco risotto,
translation.zh: 我做了我最擅长的炖小牛膝烩饭

translation.en: and I am a professional chef,
translation.zh: 我是专业大厨

translation.en: but if you just want gas-station-quality pizza--
translation.zh: 但如果你只想吃加油站水准的披萨

translation.en: No. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 不 对不起

translation.en: It's just, I haven't had a family meal since...
translation.zh: 只是我很久没参加家庭聚餐了

translation.en: Well, a long time.
translation.zh: 有一段日子了

translation.en: Anyway...
translation.zh: 不论如何

translation.en: this looks nice.
translation.zh: 看起来很棒

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: You know, that's not a bad idea.
translation.zh: 这不是个糟糕的主意

translation.en: Maybe Mom could cook dinner for us every night.
translation.zh: 也许妈妈每晚都可以给我们做晚饭

translation.en: And then we could eat together, as a family.
translation.zh: 我们作为一家人就可以一起吃饭

translation.en: Sure, no problem.
translation.zh: 当然可以

translation.en: Or what if we took, like, a family cooking class?
translation.zh: 或者我们可以上家庭厨艺课

translation.en: You could literally teach us how to cook
translation.zh: 你可以在字面意义上教我们怎么做饭

translation.en: and we could take turns making the dinners.
translation.zh: 然后我们可以轮流做晚饭

translation.en: That actually sounds kind of fun.
translation.zh: 这个听起来还真挺有趣的

translation.en: Cool.
translation.zh: 酷

translation.en: And Dad used "literally" the right way.
translation.zh: 爸爸用“字面意义上”用对了

translation.en: -So how was your first day of school? -Pretty good.
translation.zh: -你第一天上学怎么样？ -挺好的

translation.en: I stole the driver's ed. car,
translation.zh: 我偷了驾驶课的汽车

translation.en: and got a whole three blocks before they brought me down with a spike strip.
translation.zh: 开出去三条街区 他们才用钉子链条把我给拦下来

translation.en: She's kidding.
translation.zh: 她开玩笑的

translation.en: You're kidding, right?
translation.zh: 你开玩笑的吧？

translation.en: It's so hard to tell what's real and what's made up with you, Nick.
translation.zh: 真的很难分辨你哪些是真的 哪些是编的 妮可

translation.en: Speaking of which, I heard Jeremy was hoping to get a new car
translation.zh: 说起来 我听说杰瑞米拿到驾照后

translation.en: when he gets his license.
translation.zh: 想买辆新车

translation.en: Until you showed up, and we had to make sacrifices.
translation.zh: 直到你出现了 我们不得不做出牺牲

translation.en: Well, about that, I had a thought.
translation.zh: 这件事我有个想法

translation.en: I'm working at Liz's restaurant after school now.
translation.zh: 我现在放学后在丽兹的餐厅工作

translation.en: Wait, what?
translation.zh: 慢着 什么？

translation.en: Surprise.
translation.zh: 惊喜

translation.en: This girl can carry a freakish amount of cannelloni.
translation.zh: 这个妹子能拿得动超级多意大利面卷

translation.en: We'll talk later.
translation.zh: 迟点聊

translation.en: So maybe you could get a job, too,
translation.zh: 所以也许你也能打工

translation.en: and buy your own car.
translation.zh: 自己攒钱买车

translation.en: Wait, like a "job" job, where I have to do stuff people don't wanna do?
translation.zh: 正经的“工作”吗？ 我得做别人不想做的事情？

translation.en: This sounds like a pretty good solution.
translation.zh: 听起来是个挺不错的方案

translation.en: It's really smart, Nick.
translation.zh: 非常聪明的办法 妮可

translation.en: Thank you so much.
translation.zh: 非常感谢

translation.en: You deserve it.
translation.zh: 你应得的

translation.en: This calls for a celebration.
translation.zh: 我们需要庆祝

translation.en: I saw some sparkling cider in the fridge.
translation.zh: 我在冰箱里看到了气泡苹果汁

translation.en: I hope that's okay.
translation.zh: 应该没问题吧？

translation.en: Sure, sounds nice.
translation.zh: 当然 听起来不错

translation.en: Let me go get it.
translation.zh: 我去拿

translation.en: [Liz] Nick, do you need any help?
translation.zh: 妮可 你需要帮助吗？

translation.en: No, I'm good.
translation.zh: 不用 我没问题

translation.en: Well, here's to my new family.
translation.zh: 敬我的新家庭

translation.en: Wait! I want to say something.
translation.zh: 慢着 我有话要说

translation.en: I know you've only been here a little while, Nick,
translation.zh: 我知道你才刚来不久 妮可

translation.en: but I feel like you coming to us, this is happening for a reason.
translation.zh: 但我感觉你到我们家来是有原因的

translation.en: Oh, it's definitely happening for a reason.
translation.zh: 肯定是有原因的

translation.en: No, I mean, maybe this is exactly what we all need, to shake things up,
translation.zh: 也许这正是我们需要的 做一些改变

translation.en: make us realize how much we love each other.
translation.zh: 让我们意识到我们有多爱彼此

translation.en: I'll drink to that.
translation.zh: 干杯

translation.en: Wait. I want to say something, too.
translation.zh: 慢着 我也有话要说

translation.en: I'll admit that I was unsure about you living with us,
translation.zh: 我承认我本来不确定 你和我们同住这件事

translation.en: but I was wrong.
translation.zh: 但我错了

translation.en: You know, you kids could learn from this girl,
translation.zh: 孩子们 你们可以向这个女孩学习

translation.en: 'cause she has faced hardship,
translation.zh: 因为她经受了苦难

translation.en: and that has given her character.
translation.zh: 这磨炼了她的品德

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: Should we drink to that?
translation.zh: 不如我们干杯吧

translation.en: Wait.
translation.zh: 慢着

translation.en: I want to say something, too.
translation.zh: 我也有话要说

translation.en: I know you all know that helping people's my thing.
translation.zh: 我知道你们都知道 我的专长就是帮助别人

translation.en: As long as everyone hears about it.
translation.zh: 只要大家都听说就行

translation.en: But I...
translation.zh: 但是我…

translation.en: feel like Nick is the one helping me.
translation.zh: 这次是妮可在帮助我

translation.en: She's like the sister I never had.
translation.zh: 她就像是我从没有过的妹妹

translation.en: Wow. That's actually really sweet.
translation.zh: 哇 你这么说真的很可爱

translation.en: So... drink?
translation.zh: 干杯吧？

translation.en: Wait. I want to say something, too.
translation.zh: 慢着 我也有话要说

translation.en: I guess, I'll admit,
translation.zh: 我想承认

translation.en: I was also unsure about Nick.
translation.zh: 我之前对妮可也不确定

translation.en: Am unsure.
translation.zh: 现在也是

translation.en: But at the same time, I don't know...
translation.zh: 但与此同时 我不知道…

translation.en: if I'm being honest with myself,
translation.zh: 如果我诚实地看的话

translation.en: maybe I really am just afraid of sharing what I've got.
translation.zh: 也许我确实害怕分享我有的东西

translation.en: Because the truth is...
translation.zh: 因为事实是…

translation.en: I do have a lot.
translation.zh: 我的确有很多东西

translation.en: Now, let's drink to that.
translation.zh: 为这个干杯

translation.en: Wait!
translation.zh: 慢着

translation.en: I'm sorry. It's just...
translation.zh: 抱歉

translation.en: you guys don't realize how lucky you are to have each other.
translation.zh: 你们没有意识到你们拥有彼此 是多么幸运

translation.en: I guess it's not until you lose your family that you realize that...
translation.zh: 我想只有失去家庭之后 才会意识到…

translation.en: family is everything.
translation.zh: 家庭就是一切

translation.en: And even if you don't always get along,
translation.zh: 即使你们不总是能和睦相处

translation.en: or you get on each other's nerves,
translation.zh: 或者会惹对方生气

translation.en: just knowing that your family is there...
translation.zh: 知道你的家人在那里

translation.en: somehow it just makes everything better.
translation.zh: 就会让一切都好得多

translation.en: Now let's drink before somebody else makes a speech.
translation.zh: 趁没人发言我们赶紧喝吧

translation.en: No, wait!
translation.zh: 慢着

translation.en: What the hell was that?
translation.zh: 这是什么鬼？

translation.en: I just saw a Band-Aid... in the bottle of cider...
translation.zh: 我刚看到苹果汁瓶里有一个创可贴

translation.en: A used Band-Aid.
translation.zh: 用过的创可贴

translation.en: I'm sorry. I'll clean this up. Just...
translation.zh: 抱歉 我会清理的

translation.en: stay right here.
translation.zh: 站在那儿别动

translation.en: [Sam] Well?
translation.zh: 怎么样？

translation.en: It's not the right time, Sam.
translation.zh: 时机不对 山姆

translation.en: What do you mean, it's not the right time?
translation.zh: 什么叫时机不对？

translation.en: We're down the street in a U-Haul.
translation.zh: 我们已经开着租来的卡车到附近了

translation.en: I just jumped the gun on calling it.
translation.zh: 我过早行动了

translation.en: But the truth is, we need to be patient here.
translation.zh: 事实是我们需要耐心

translation.en: We can get a lot more than 50 grand if we play this right.
translation.zh: 如果我们玩对了 能拿到的远不止五万美元

translation.en: How much more?
translation.zh: 多多少？

translation.en: How does a million sound?
translation.zh: 一百万听起来如何？

translation.en: Ed works at a bank.
translation.zh: 艾德在银行工作

translation.en: I can get passwords, account information.
translation.zh: 我可以拿到密码、账户信息

translation.en: And Liz owns a restaurant.
translation.zh: 丽兹有一间餐厅

translation.en: There's cash just lying around.
translation.zh: 到处都是现金

translation.en: I saw it with my own eyes.
translation.zh: 我亲眼见到的

translation.en: So let's not be stupid.
translation.zh: 所以我们不要犯蠢

translation.en: This is a long con.
translation.zh: 这是一个长期骗局

translation.en: Why jump at the easy money
translation.zh: 为什么要急着抢小钱？

translation.en: when we can take the whole enchilada?
translation.zh: 我们有机会拿到全部

translation.en: You better be right.
translation.zh: 你最好没搞错

translation.en: Trust me.
translation.zh: 相信我

translation.en: [Nick] Who wants some gas-station-quality pizza?
translation.zh: 谁想吃加油站水准的披萨？

translation.en: Don't worry about Sam and Dorothy.
translation.zh: 别担心山姆和多萝西了

translation.en: I can put them off as long as I need to.
translation.zh: 我可以一直拖延他们 想拖延多久都行

translation.en: Trust me.
translation.zh: 相信我

translation.en: They have no idea this isn't a random family.
translation.zh: 他们完全不知道 这并不是随便选的一家人

translation.en: Well, I'd better go.
translation.zh: 我得挂了

translation.en: I don't want them to get suspicious.
translation.zh: 我不希望他们起疑

translation.en: You stay safe, too.
translation.zh: 你也注意安全

translation.en: I know, I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: I love you, too, Dad.
translation.zh: 我也爱你 爸爸
